name: Commenze Comment Sections-wp
author: Commenze.com

sections.description:
Commenze provides users with a the ability to create fully custom comment sections that will match the look and feel of your WordPress site.

Using our simple no-code Drag & Drop Editor anyone can create a custom theme for their comment section.

On top of the above, Commenze is super fast & lightweight, ad-free and privacy focused with industry leading spam protection & moderation.

short_description: Replace the default wordpress comment sections with fully customizable no-code comment sections.
